org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.core

Interface AuthenticationContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthContextLocalWrapper

    public interface AuthenticationContext
    Interface for all Authentication Contexts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroyOldSession()
      Destroy the old session (if one exists) that existed before this authentication attempt.
      void destroySession()
      Destroy the session used for this authentication attempt.
      AuthContextLocal getAuthContext()
      Returns the wrapped AuthContextLocal.
      String getErrorCode()
      Returns the error code for the login process.
      String getErrorMessage()
      Returns the error message for the login process.
      String getFailureURL()
      Returns the Failure Login URL for the authenticating user.
      AuthIndexType getIndexType()
      Returns the current authentication index type from the AuthContextLocal.
      String getOrgDN()
      Returns the Organization DN.
      Callback[] getRequirements()
      Returns an array of Callbacks that must be populated by the user and returned back.
      Callback[] getRequirements(boolean noFilter)
      Returns an array of Callbacks that must be populated by the user and returned back.
      SessionID getSessionID()
      Returns the Session ID for the login process.
      SSOToken getSSOToken()
      Returns the SSO Token for the authenticated user.
      AuthContext.Status getStatus()
      Returns the current status of the authentication process.
      String getSuccessURL()
      Returns the Successful Login URL for the authenticated user.
      boolean hasMoreRequirements()
      Checks if the login process requires more information from the user to complete the authentication.
      boolean hasOldSession()
      Determines whether there is an old session associated with this authentication
      boolean isForceAuth()
      Determines whether this is a "force auth" authentication attempt.
      boolean isSessionUpgrade()
      Determines whether this authentication is for a session upgrade or not.
      void login()
      Starts the login process for the given AuthContextLocal object.
      void login(AuthContext.IndexType indexType, String indexValue)
      Starts the login process for the given AuthContextLocal object.

      Starts the login process for the given AuthContextLocal object.
      void restoreOldSession()
      Restore the old session (if it exists) that existed before this authentication attempt.
      void setOrgDN(String orgDN)
      Sets the organisation DN.
      void submitRequirements(Callback[] callbacks)
      Submit the populated Callback array to the authentication plug-in modules.

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthContext

        AuthContextLocal getAuthContext()
        Returns the wrapped AuthContextLocal.
        Returns:
        The wrapped AuthContextLocal.

      • login

        void login()
    throws AuthLoginException
        Starts the login process for the given AuthContextLocal object.
        Throws:
        AuthLoginException - If a problem occurred during login.

      • login

        void login(AuthContext.IndexType indexType,
           String indexValue)
    throws AuthLoginException
        Starts the login process for the given AuthContextLocal object.
        Parameters:
        indexType - The authentication index type.
        indexValue - The authentication index value.
        Throws:
        AuthLoginException - If a problem occurred during login.

      • login

        void login(AuthContext.IndexType indexType,
           String indexValue,
           Map<String,Set<String>> envMap,
           String locale)
    throws AuthLoginException
        Starts the login process for the given AuthContextLocal object.
        Parameters:
        indexType - The authentication index type.
        indexValue - The authentication index value.
        envMap - The environment map, only applicable when the authentication index type is RESOURCE.
        locale - The locale to use in the authentication process.
        Throws:
        AuthLoginException - If a problem occurred during login.

      • hasMoreRequirements

        boolean hasMoreRequirements()
        Checks if the login process requires more information from the user to complete the authentication.
        Returns:
        True if more credentials are required from the user, otherwise false.

      • getRequirements

        Callback[] getRequirements()
        Returns an array of Callbacks that must be populated by the user and returned back. These objects are requested by the authentication plug-ins, and these are usually displayed to the user. The user then provides the requested information for it to be authenticated.
        Returns:
        An array of Callbacks requesting credentials from user.

      • getRequirements

        Callback[] getRequirements(boolean noFilter)
        Returns an array of Callbacks that must be populated by the user and returned back. These objects are requested by the authentication plug-ins, and these are usually displayed to the user. The user then provides the requested information for it to be authenticated.
        Parameters:
        noFilter - Whether to filter out PagePropertiesCallbacks from the array of Callbacks or not.
        Returns:
        An array of Callbacks requesting credentials from user.

      • submitRequirements

        void submitRequirements(Callback[] callbacks)
        Submit the populated Callback array to the authentication plug-in modules.
        Parameters:
        callbacks - An array of Callbacks.

      • getIndexType

        AuthIndexType getIndexType()
        Returns the current authentication index type from the AuthContextLocal.
        Returns:
        The current authentication index type.

      • getStatus

        AuthContext.Status getStatus()
        Returns the current status of the authentication process.
        Returns:
        The current status of the authentication process.

      • getOrgDN

        String getOrgDN()
        Returns the Organization DN.
        Returns:
        The Organization DN.

      • getSSOToken

        SSOToken getSSOToken()
        Returns the SSO Token for the authenticated user.
        Returns:
        The SSO Token.

      • getErrorCode

        String getErrorCode()
        Returns the error code for the login process.
        Returns:
        The error code.

      • getErrorMessage

        String getErrorMessage()
        Returns the error message for the login process.
        Returns:
        The error message.

      • getSessionID

        SessionID getSessionID()
        Returns the Session ID for the login process.
        Returns:
        The Session ID.

      • setOrgDN

        void setOrgDN(String orgDN)
        Sets the organisation DN.
        Parameters:
        orgDN - The organisation DN.

      • getSuccessURL

        String getSuccessURL()
        Returns the Successful Login URL for the authenticated user.
        Returns:
        The Successful Login URL.

      • getFailureURL

        String getFailureURL()
        Returns the Failure Login URL for the authenticating user.
        Returns:
        The Failure Login URL.

      • hasOldSession

        boolean hasOldSession()
        Determines whether there is an old session associated with this authentication
        Returns:
        true if an old session exists

      • isSessionUpgrade

        boolean isSessionUpgrade()
        Determines whether this authentication is for a session upgrade or not.
        Returns:
        true if this is a session upgrade (or force-auth) attempt, otherwise false.

      • isForceAuth

        boolean isForceAuth()
        Determines whether this is a "force auth" authentication attempt. Force auth mode is similar to session upgrade but upgrades the existing session rather than creating a new one.
        Returns:
        true if this is a force-auth autentication.

      • destroySession

        void destroySession()
        Destroy the session used for this authentication attempt.

      • restoreOldSession

        void restoreOldSession()
        Restore the old session (if it exists) that existed before this authentication attempt. If no previous session exists then this method does nothing.

      • destroyOldSession

        void destroyOldSession()
        Destroy the old session (if one exists) that existed before this authentication attempt. If no previous session exists (e.g., if this is a fresh authentication) then this method does nothing.
